alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laramie County through 430 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Carpenter, or 20 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burns, Hillsdale and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 374 and 390. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
